author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Stimulated by the results of the static analyzer, here are a few simplifications meant to remove dead assignments and computations.

In particular, it looks like the `bend` variable was defined, updated, but never used inside  L1Trigger/L1TMuonEndCap/src/EMTFSubsystemCollector.cc: I therefore fully removed it from the code

#### PR validation:

It builds

No changes are expected
title: Remove unneeded computations in L1Trigger/L1TMuon and L1Trigger/L1TMuonEndCap
